name: Avocado Whole Wheat Pasta Salad
author: SJWELLS
summary: This dish incorporates one of my favorite things in the universe, avocado, into a side dish with other fresh vegetables.  It also works as a vegan main course dish.
ingredients: 1 (12 ounce) box whole wheat rotini pasta
1 large carrot, cut into matchstick-size pieces
salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil
Cook the rotini at a boil until tender yet firm to the bite, about 10 minutes; drain and run under cold water to prevent sticking
Whisk olive oil, vinegar, lemon juice, and honey together in a bowl until dressing is smooth
Mix pasta, avocados, green bell pepper, carrot, green onions, celery, garlic, basil, parsley, and cilantro together in a bowl
Drizzle dressing over pasta mixture and toss to coat
Add lemon zest, salt, and pepper to pasta salad
